did.unittitle: Oswego Central Trades & Labor Council Meeting Minutes, 1916-1924
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Bound volume of meeting minutes of the Oswego Central Trades and Labor Council

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one bound volume of meeting minutes of the Oswego Central Trades and Labor Council. The volume covers meetings from February 11, 1916 through January 9, 1924.

controlaccess.corpname: Central Trades and Labor Council (Oswego, N.Y.)

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
